name: MiniTank Mirror
description:
Introduction

This project named poorly "MiniTank" is supposed to be a Unity example project based on the Mirror implementation of the multiplayer in Unity3D.

THIS IS NOT A GAME in a sense that it's more a game FOR gamedevs than a game for gamers.

I just wanted a space to expose the project and itch.io seems to be a good place.

I aimed to make a comprehensive, simple yet complete project which can be used as blueprint for a TPS/FPS multiplayer game.

Keep in mind that it was a project for me to learn, and to share my discoveries with you.
Don't hesitate to comment and PR the code if you have better implementations and ideas.

You'll find more informations in the README of the project via the gitlab link bellow.

Donations

I've spent something like one and a half month on this little thing. So if it was usefull to you, please consider donate a tip via the itch.io page of the project!
